name: SKATE DECK
description:
SKATE DECK

provenance : "made in southern california"

measurements : 25" x 7" wide.

material(s) : hand shaped solid african mahogany with white oak strip. rubbed linseed oil finish.

style notes : inspired by a vintage 1970s skateboard found in san diego.

purchase details : each deck is handmade to order in southern california. please allow a 2 - 4 week lead time for up to 2 individual skate decks, and a 10 - 12 week lead time for up to 4 individual skate decks.

shipping : please contact us directly for shipping options and rates, including direct pick-up.

contact : info@khastoo.com

name: PILLOW
description:
PILLOW

size : oversized throw pillow

provenance : "made in southern california"

measurements : 20" x 20" x 7" (approximate)

material(s) : 100% wool shell with a removable feather stuffed cotton insert.

style notes : crafted from a dense and luxurious 100% wool flannel the oversized and solidly hued 'flannel pillow' by smithshop is a versatile addition to the well-appointed space. available in cortez gray. dry clean.

purchase details : each pillow is handmade to order in southern california. please allow a lead time of up to 2 weeks for up to 2 individual pillows and a lead time of up to 4 weeks for 6 individual pillows.

shipping : please contact us directly for shipping options and rates, including direct pick-up our los angeles gallery.

contact : info@khastoo.com

name: TABLE LAMP
description:
'TABLE LAMP'

provenance : "made in southern california"

measurements : base: 13.5" x 7"

material(s) : handmade solid black walnut base with a rubbed linseed oil finish. gold metallic lined lampshade.

notes : inspired by a natural stone diving board in palm springs.

purchase details : each lamp is handmade to order at our southern california woodshop. please allow a 4 - 8 week lead time for up to 2 individual lamps, and a 10 - 14 week lead time for up to 4 individual lamps.

shipping : please contact us directly for shipping options and rates, including direct pick-up.

name: SIDE CHAIR
description:
SIDE CHAIR

provenance : "handmade in southern california"

measurements : frame 20" x 18" | seat 16.5" x 15" | back 19"x 7"

material(s) : hand rubbed solid black walnut and deer tanned leather with brass hardware.

style notes : inspired by a pair of 1950s mass-produced folding chairs the designer found at a yard sale in san juan capistrano.

purchase details : each chair is handmade to order in southern california. please allow a 8 - 10 week lead time for up to 2 individual chairs, and a 12 - 14 week lead time for up to 4 individual chairs.

shipping : please contact us directly for shipping options and rates including direct pick-up (california only).

contact : info@khastoo.com
